text: Has anyone had issues using the form embed option with `groupErrors` seems when setting it to true or false, the erros aren't being grouped on the form...
I would assume this would be the `.hs_error_rollup` div's content that this setting is for?
I've never had luck getting that to work - seems like it's broken.
I would assume the same - the rollup should contain all the errors when `groupErrors` is enabled.

Is it possible to reference a hosted CSS/JS file inside the design tools without a timestamp as part of the page path? I wrote a few CSS stylesheets that I am including for form styling on a remote Drupal site and every time the file is updated the public URL changes (probably due to cachebusting) - but I want to bypass the cache in this case.
Anyone know if you can edit the plain text email template itself rather than doing each individually?
